languages.text:
Чем выше значение навыков персонажей, тем проще получить успех при проверке. Значение навыков зависит от соответствующей характеристики, развития самого навыка при повышении уровня, а также бонусов от надетых на персонаже предметов.
Чтобы успешнее проходить разные проверки во время игры, развивайте разные навыки у вашего персонажа и его компаньонов.

The higher a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} score, the easier it is for them to succeed on {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Skill scores depend on the character's respective characteristic scores, skill advancements on level ups, and any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} the character's equipment might offer.
To succeed on various tests during gameplay, develop different skills for your character and their companions.
languages.original_text:
Чем выше значение навыков персонажей, тем проще получить успех при проверке. Значение навыков зависит от соответствующей характеристики, развития самого навыка при повышении уровня, а также бонусов от надетых на персонаже предметов.
Чтобы успешнее проходить разные проверки во время игры, развивайте разные навыки у вашего персонажа и его компаньонов.

traits.locale_text:
The higher is a character's skill score, the easier it is for them to succeed on a test. Skill scores depend on the character's respective characteristic scores, skill advancements on level ups, and any bonuses the character's equipment might offer.
To succeed on various tests during gameplay, develop different skills for your character and their companions.

The higher is a character's skill score, the easier it is for them to succeed on a test. Skill scores depend on the character's respective characteristic scores, skill advancements on level ups, and any bonuses the character's equipment might offer.
To succeed on various tests during gameplay, develop different skills for your character and their companions.

The higher a character's skill score, the easier it is for them to succeed on tests. Skill scores depend on the character's respective characteristic scores, skill advancements on level ups, and any bonuses the character's equipment might offer.
To succeed on various tests during gameplay, develop different skills for your character and their companions.

The higher a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} score, the easier it is for them to succeed on {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Skill scores depend on the character's respective characteristic scores, skill advancements on level ups, and any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} the character's equipment might offer.
To succeed on various tests during gameplay, develop different skills for your character and their companions.

The higher a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} score, the easier it is for them to succeed on {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Skill scores depend on the character's respective characteristic scores, skill advancements on level ups, and any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} the character's equipment might offer.
To succeed on various tests during gameplay, develop different skills for your character and their companions.

languages.text:
Cuanto más alta es la puntuación de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} de un personaje, más fácil le será superar las {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g}. Las puntuaciones de habilidad del personaje dependen de la característica correspondiente, los avances al subir de nivel y las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} que le proporcione su equipo.
Para alcanzar el éxito en diferentes pruebas durante el juego, desarrolla habilidades diferentes en tu personaje y sus compañeros.
languages.original_text:
The higher a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} score, the easier it is for them to succeed on {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Skill scores depend on the character's respective characteristic scores, skill advancements on level ups, and any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} the character's equipment might offer.
To succeed on various tests during gameplay, develop different skills for your character and their companions.

traits.locale_text:
Cuanto más alta es la puntuación de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} de un personaje, más fácil le será superar las {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g}. Las puntuaciones de habilidad del personaje dependen de la característica correspondiente, los avances al subir de nivel y las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} que le proporcione su equipo.
Para alcanzar el éxito en diferentes pruebas durante el juego, desarrolla habilidades diferentes en tu personaje y sus compañeros.

languages.text:
キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}スコアが高ければ高いほど、{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格しやすくなる。スキルスコアは、キャラクターのそれぞれの特性スコア、レベルアップ時のスキルの進歩、およびキャラクターの装備が提供する{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}によって異なる。
ゲームプレイ中のさまざまな判定に合格するためにも、キャラクターや仲間にさまざまなスキルを身につけさせよう。
languages.original_text:
The higher a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} score, the easier it is for them to succeed on {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Skill scores depend on the character's respective characteristic scores, skill advancements on level ups, and any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} the character's equipment might offer.
To succeed on various tests during gameplay, develop different skills for your character and their companions.

traits.locale_text:
キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}スコアが高ければ高いほど、{g|Encyclopedia:Test}テスト{/g}に合格しやすくなる。スキルスコアは、キャラクターのそれぞれの特性スコア、レベルアップ時のスキルの進歩、およびキャラクターの装備が提供する{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}によって異なる。
ゲームプレイ中のさまざまなテストに合格するために、キャラクターとその仲間にさまざまなスキルを身につけさせよう。

languages.text:
角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}修正值越高，就越容易通过{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。技能修正值取决于角色的相关属性值，升级时的技能进阶加值，以及角色的装备提供的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。
若想在游戏过程中的各种检定取得成功，请为角色与同伴升级相关技能。
languages.original_text:
The higher a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} score, the easier it is for them to succeed on {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Skill scores depend on the character's respective characteristic scores, skill advancements on level ups, and any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} the character's equipment might offer.
To succeed on various tests during gameplay, develop different skills for your character and their companions.

traits.locale_text:
角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}修正值越高，就越容易通过{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。技能修正值取决于角色的相关属性值，升级时的技能进阶加值，以及角色的装备提供的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。
若想在游戏过程中的各种检定取得成功，请为角色与同伴升级相关技能。

languages.text:
Je höher der {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeitswert{/g} eines Charakters ist, desto einfacher ist es, {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} zu bestehen. Die Fähigkeitswerte basieren auf den jeweiligen Eigenschaften des Charakters, den Fortschritten hinsichtlich des Stufenaufstiegs und den {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g}, die die Ausrüstung des Charakters möglicherweise bietet.
Um bei unterschiedlichen Proben erfolgreich zu sein, entwickle verschiedene Fähigkeiten für deinen Charakter und seine Gefährten.
languages.original_text:
The higher a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} score, the easier it is for them to succeed on {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Skill scores depend on the character's respective characteristic scores, skill advancements on level ups, and any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} the character's equipment might offer.
To succeed on various tests during gameplay, develop different skills for your character and their companions.

traits.locale_text:
Je höher der {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeitswert{/g} eines Charakters ist, desto einfacher ist es, die {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} zu bestehen. Die Fähigkeitswerte hängen von den jeweiligen Eigenschaften des Charakters, den Fortschritten in den Fähigkeiten beim Stufenaufstieg und den {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} ab, die die Ausrüstung des Charakters möglicherweise bietet.
Um bei unterschiedlichen Proben erfolgreich zu sein, entwickle verschiedene Fähigkeiten für deinen Charakter und seine Gefährten.

languages.text:
Plus le score de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} d'un personnage est élevé, plus il lui est facile de réussir les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Les scores de compétences dépendent des scores de caractéristiques respectifs des personnages, des améliorations de compétences lors des montées de niveau et des éventuels {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} offerts par l'équipement du personnage.
Pour réussir les différents tests du jeu, développez différentes compétences pour votre personnage et ses compagnons.
languages.original_text:
The higher a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} score, the easier it is for them to succeed on {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Skill scores depend on the character's respective characteristic scores, skill advancements on level ups, and any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} the character's equipment might offer.
To succeed on various tests during gameplay, develop different skills for your character and their companions.

languages.text:
Bir karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}yetenek{/g} puanı ne kadar yüksekse {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testlerde{/g} başarılı olması da o kadar kolay olur. Yetenek puanı; karakterin ilgili nitelikteki puanına, seviye artışlarındaki yetenek gelişimlerine ve karakterin ekipmanının sunduğu her türlü {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslara{/g} göre belirlenir.
Oyunu oynarken çeşitli testlerde başarılı olabilmek için, karakterin ve yoldaşları için farklı yetenekler geliştir.
